document.full_text: the capacity crowd expected a classic instead of a clunker, and so when rafael nadal began to pull away from an erratic roger federer, a chant broke out.
document.title: nadal beats federer at key biscayne
lines_and_colors: the capacity crowd expected a classic instead of a clunker, and so when rafael nadal began to pull away from an erratic roger federer, a chant broke out.
